Posts.Content: I had a diep flap and they just took fat from tummy and reconstructed a breast. It was a 12 hour op, so sorry to contradict, I was back to work after 12 weeks. I had my op mid May. Sending best wishes Anne
Posts.Title: ld flap Reconstruction

Posts.Content: Hi. I had my diep flap on 16th may , so 3 1/2 weeks ago now, everything seems fine apart from an infection in stomach wound, but I wondered if you have suffered with your tummy going really tight as if there is lots of trapped gas/wind I find this is so uncomfortable and really makes me feel nauseous, also how long does this last.
Posts.Title: Anyone had a DIEP Flap reconstruction?
